name: Secret Gun
description:
Your mision is to eliminate all the enemies as you can without dying. If you die, you can respawn, but your kills will restart. There are some enemies spawners that create new enemies, so take care with them.

You can move with WASD, shoot the gun with left click, use your knife with right click and reload with R. Hope you enjoy it.

Música de https://www.fiftysounds.com/es/
